content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm asking for €1,200 per month. Remember, this is a prime location and a newly built apartment, so I'm sure you'll find it worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment and the location, I'm not sure if the price reflects the market value. Could we perhaps negotiate a lower rate?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Sure, Max, I'm always up for a good negotiation. How about €1,100 per month? That's already a considerable discount, but I'm sure you'll find it a fair price for such a prime location and the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, while €1,100 is more in line with what I had in mind, I was hoping for something just a bit lower. Would you consider €1,050? This would be more in line with my budget and I'm sure with your expertise, you can appreciate a fair deal.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand your budget concerns, but €1,050 is too low for this apartment. I'm willing to go down to €1,080, but that's the lowest I can go while still considering it a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is commendable. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. If we can agree on €1,080, I believe we have a deal. I agree to the price of €1,080 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1,080] Euro! Congratulations, Max! The apartment is now yours for €1,080 per month. I hope you'll enjoy your stay.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving in and making this my new home. Is there anything else I should know about the rental process or the apartment itself?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for renting my apartment, Max. I hope you'll be a satisfied tenant. As for the rental process, you'll need to sign a rental agreement and provide a deposit. The apartment is already equipped with all the necessary utilities, and I'll provide you with the necessary contact information for any issues that may arise. I wish you a pleasant stay.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's great to hear, Mister Schmidt. I'll make sure to review the rental agreement carefully and prepare the deposit. I'm looking forward to a smooth rental process. Thank you once again for your time and for offering me such a wonderful apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max. I'm happy to have you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. Until we meet again, take care!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll be in touch if I have any questions. Have a great day!
name: Max Müller from Germany
